articles.title: Bones of Tyrannosaurus rex cousin found by British fossil hunters - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The new dinosaur, which has been named Vectaerovenator inopinatus, lived in the Cretaceous period 115 million years ago and was estimated to have been up to four metres long, the palaeontologists said.
articles.content: Four bones found on a beach on the Isle of Wight, off Englands south coast, belong to a new species of theropod dinosaur, the group that includes Tyrannosaurus rex, researchers at the University of S… [+1869 chars]

articles.author: Agence France-Presse | Posted by Arpan Rai
articles.title: United Arab Emirates launches space mission to Mars from Japan, calls it ‘Hope’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Hope Probe will launch from Japan’s Tanegashima Space Center at 1:58 a.m. UAE time/6:58 a.m. Japanese time Monday (2158 GMT Sunday) for a seven-month journey to the red planet, where it will orbit and send back data about the atmosphere.
articles.content:
The first Arab space mission to Mars blasted off Monday aboard a rocket from Japan, after weather delays set back the launch of the probe dubbed Hope.
A live feed of the launch showed the rocket car… [+1581 chars]
